CustomField.description: field used to identify the HWS case record type.
CustomField.formula: OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Advance_Exchange_In_Days', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Advance_Exchange_In_Hours', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Child_Case_Read_Only', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Parent_Case', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Parent_Case_Ready_Only', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Return_For_Repair', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Spare_Part_Sales', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HWS_Spare_Part_Sales_Read_only' )
CustomField.label: HWS Record Type Check
